description:
Wada and Yamamoto ponder shifting loyalties, digital surveillance, content monetization, and fad diets.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Randy / Gorilla Tape / Toxic Fan / See You Tomorrow, at the Food Court
Randy / Gorilla Tape / Yakkai / Food Court de, Mata Ashita.
ランディ / ゴリラテープ / 厄介 / フードコートで, また明日.
